method.name: _initialize
method.comment: You Should Initialized Befor Use IsInstalledByBazaar Function! Notice: This Library Works On Android API 5 And Above Than It.

method.name: _isinstalledbybazaar
method.comment: Returns True If Your Packagename Is Installed By Bazaar Returns Null If Your Packagename Is Installed By Other Apps
